column4: is there anyway to access a machine remotely without having auto login?

im having an issue with the machine not getting on the network automatically because it's wireless and keeps asking me to enter in the root password before it connects.  how do i get it online to use vnc if i can't get it to connect automatically via wireless?
it's the gnome-keyring thing, we can set it to use unencrypted data, so that it won't ask for password for wireless
lol, i cannot find it anymore
